home.intro: Hi, My Name Is Fathan Jamil.
home.desc: Hello I'm Fathan Jamil, a Frontend Developer who specializes in crafting visually stunning and highly responsive web interfaces.

service1.title: Web UI/UX Design
service1.desc: Crafting modern, user-friendly, and visually appealing web interfaces with a focus on usability, accessibility, and interactive experiences.

service2.title: Fullstack Web
service2.desc: Building complete web applications from front to back — handling everything from databases and APIs to frontend interactions.

service3.title: Frontend Web
service3.desc: Developing fast, responsive, and modern user interfaces using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS for seamless user experiences.

project1.title: Barcelona Landing Page Website
project1.desc: A landing page for Fc Barcelona Club, built with React, TailwindCSS, and Firebase.

project2.title: FMDB Movie Database Platform
project2.desc: A movie database platform that provides comprehensive information about films, including details, reviews, and ratings, built with React and TailwindCSS.

project3.title: XII PPLG Songfess & Menfess
project3.desc: A Songfess & Menfess project for XII PPLG SMKN 4 Tasikmalaya.
